title: Spiky Ball Trap
summaries: The Spiky Ball Trap is a type of trap that can be found naturally in the Jungle Temple and, rarely, outside the Temple's door. When activated, it dispenses orange spiky balls that bounce several times. It has a cooldown of (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 5 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 4 seconds between activations. The spiky balls deal 80 / 160 / 240 damage to players (40 damage to NPCs, enemies, and critters).
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Spiky Ball Traps can be rotated 90° with a hammer. The total number of spiky balls spawned at once is limited. See below for details.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Unlike Lihzahrd Bricks, breaking Spiky Ball Traps does not require the Picksaw.
